## methodSelector variable

Selector to extract the HTTP method from the request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
methodSelector: SyncSelector<string | undefined>
```

## Example

Simple example

```ts

const prismyHandler = prismy(
 [methodSelector],
 method => {
   if (method !== 'GET') {
     throw createError(405)
   }
 }
)

```
